name: ACCELERATE ZONE
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

■ABOUT


This is the early access version of the FULL-THROTTLE STG "ACCELERATE ZONE".
This is an action shooting game where the faster you go, the better your strategy.
It's okay to take your time and go at your own pace.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

■PURPOSE


The goal is to reach the goal while avoiding enemies and obstacles.
If the energy runs out in the middle, it will be a mistake.

If you destroy an enemy with a shot, a cube that can replenish energy will appear.
The trick is to proceed while replenishing frequently.
If you get an option, you can use an option shoot that can destroy obstacles.
Let's use it in case of emergency.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

■HOW TO


It supports operation with keyboard and Xinput compatible gamepad.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

■CREDIT

game design:mdkGAMES
illustration:七条メルル
BGM:OtoLogic
